name: CubeHunter Attraction VR
description:
Hello and welcome, 
I'm currently an ICT student at Fontys university. 
And sometimes I got some spare time and then I want to challenge myself in other interesting ICT stuff. As always, I hope you like what I created here.
Also I would love to hear from you what you think of it!
Even if you hated it! I just want to improve myself and my ICT skills.
You can do this by leaving a comment, but I guess you already knew that.
I hope you have a fun time trying this out!

Game Description 

In this game you will get a fun little ride through a small rocky woody world.
In this world there live some cute looking cubes. Your goal is to shoot as many of them as possible. At the end of the ride, you'll get to know how well you did!

Controls

You'll only need the trigger button to shoot, nothing more ;)

VR Headset

For this game you'll need to have:
- SteamVR.
- Htc Vive or Windows Mixed Reality Headset.

For oculus users, I want to advise you to have a 360 degrees (roomscale) setup ready.

(Made during block 3 of year 1 (10 february - 16 february 2018), arround 25 hours of work)
